document_name: Decree No. 2008-38 on the powers of the Minister of Biofuels, Renewable Energies, and Scientific Research
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/SEN/2008/SEN-2008-01-25-Decree No. 2008-38 on the powers of the Minister of Biofuels, Renewable Energies, and Scientific Research_b3c6d7618f1e125eeecca6b1f9455065.pdf
document_description:
The Decree defines the powers of the Minister of Biofuels, Renewable Energies and Scientific Research related to preparation and implementation of policy on exploration and exploitation of alternative energy sources and promotion of scientific research.
In particular, the Minister is responsible drawing up development plans and programs to support clean energy sources and to significantly reduce the use of fossil fuels; ensures the adequacy of specific up-to-date technology choices for solar, hydro and wind energy sources and to this end promotes the basic and applied research in conjunction with national development policies.
